title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 295 - Imposition Of The New York City Earnings Tax On Nonresidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 295 - Imposition Of The New York City Earnings Tax On Nonresidents

State Regulations
§ 295.1 - The authority for and the imposition and administration of the New York City earnings tax on nonresidents
§ 295.2 - References to New York State personal income tax regulations
§ 295.3 - Residents
§ 295.4 - Persons subject to tax
§ 295.5 - Allocation to the city
§ 295.6 - Accounting periods and methods

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 295

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a]; General City

Law, § 25- n[e]; Administrative Code of the City of New York, §
11-1943

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
